data.name: ArticleSummary.Description
data.value:
Enter the details of your article including title (required), categories (if applicable) and summary text (required).
Once complete, you can save your article via the buttons above the form.

data.name: TitleHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a title for the article here.

data.name: SummaryHelp.Text
data.value: Enter a summary for the article here.

data.name: CategoriesHelp.Text
data.value: Select categories for the article here.

data.name: ArticleDetails.Description
data.value:
Enter the main body of your article (optional).
Once complete, you can save your article via the buttons above the form.

data.name: DetailsHelp.Text
data.value: Enter the body of your article here.

data.name: ArticleAppearance.Description
data.value:
Mark your article as featured or to be associated with an image.
Once complete, you can save your article via the buttons above the form.

data.name: ImageHelp.Text
data.value: You can choose an image to associate with this article.

data.name: FeaturedHelp.Text
data.value: If the page is featured it appears first in the article listing until it expires.

data.name: SecureHelp.Text
data.value: If the article is secured, the complete article (except for summary) will only be available to the roles configured in admin options.

data.name: ArticleLink.Description
data.value:
Optionally link your article to another resource.
Once complete, you can save your article via the buttons above the form.

data.name: NewWindowHelp.Text
data.value: Check to launch the link in a new window.

data.name: ArticlePublishing.Description
data.value:
Optionally specify a date & time to publish/expire your article.
Once complete, you can save your article via the buttons above the form.

data.name: plStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the start date for displaying this article. You may use the Calendar to pick a date.

data.name: valStartDate.ErrorMessage
data.value: Publishing -> Publish Time & Date is Invalid

data.name: valPublishDateRequired.ErrorMessage
data.value: Publishing -> Publish Time & Date is Required

data.name: plEndDate.Help
data.value: Enter the end date for displaying this article. You may use the Calendar to pick a date.

data.name: valEndDate.ErrorMessage
data.value: Publishing -> Expiry Time & Date is Invalid

data.name: Delete.Text
data.value: Are You Sure You Wish To Delete This Item ?

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Article Management

Users allowed to submit articles can submit or edit an article on this page. This module allows you to create a new article, modify an existing article, delete an article, add pages to an article or submit an article for approval.
